description: Application resource links for navigation and external integrations. Order in array determines display order.

taskpane.description: Default taskpane width preferences. Can be overridden by user settings.

earlyAccess.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Early Access Notice
earlyAccess.shortMessage: This add-in is an MVP for early evaluation. Use the Resources dropdown for documentation and feedback.
earlyAccess.fullMessage:
This Outlook add-in is a Minimally Viable Product (MVP) released for early evaluation and feedback. It is not yet enterprise-supported.

Please do not contact enterprise support teams for issues with this add-in.

Instead, use the Resources dropdown in the main taskpane to access documentation, report issues, and provide feedback.
